EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Forrester_DS 5 Pitfalls_Q317.Invite 7-25-17 TEXT
EmailTemplate.subject: 8/2 Webinar: How to Operationalize Data Science and Avoid the Pitfalls
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Enterprise executives and IT teams alike know that data science is not optional, but struggle to benefit from it because the process takes too long and operationalizing models in applications can be hairy.
Join guest speaker, Forrester Research’s Mike Gualtieri, and Pivotal’s Jeff Kelly and Dormain Drewitz for an interactive discussion about operationalizing data science in your business. In this webinar, the first of a two-part series, you will learn:
- The essential value of data science and the concept of perishable insights. - Five common pitfalls of data science teams. - How to dramatically increase the productivity of data scientists. - The smooth hand-off steps required to operationalize data science models in enterprise applications.
Date: Wednesday, August 2, 2017 Time: 11:00am PDT / 2:00pm EDT
ATTEND <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/aug-2-operationalizing-data-science-five-common-pitfalls-and-a-strategy-for-success?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-gualtieri-5pitfalls_q317]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us.
The Pivotal Team
